channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)
channel.description:
Day Ability 1: Invite by Card You will send a Invite card to a person of your choosing.
Day Ability 2: Jinx Card Cause a player to have a chance to Jinx themselves on the ability they use next.(there day ability if they have one if not then there night ability will be jinxed)
Night Ability 1: Roll thy Dice Roll a magical dice for a chance of use of the other Neutral's night abilities(except killing)
Night Ability 2: King of Cards When you use your cards on a person they will be temporary paralyzed for the night(wont be able to use any night abilities)
Objective: Be on a side of a winning team/ Help "scaled number based on how many players say 12 out if 20 etc" achieve there goal if your help towards someone help there team or individual to achieve there goal then you complete this objective.
Strategy: Best to work with other's to help carry out other peoples plans, how ever other neutral's probably wont help. Be careful with whom you send Invites to as you could get in hot water easily. Lore: A skilled life long gambler that has gambled with his life at risk to do what he wishes, he is The Gambler!

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)
item.dc:creator: Anthony_Python
item.description:
by assisting other’s, you will be able to send out a invite to a person(if you know there neutral, cult/Black rose or Blue dragon, but if you don’t know then it’s a bit of a gamble) and they can Accept or Refuse, if they accept be careful of other’s as you can get in trouble easily.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)

But how does the Gambler “get onto the side” of one team or another?

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)
item.dc:creator: Anthony_Python
item.description:
No incorrect “Surviving” is a bit superficial because you still can achieve your goal while dead.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Not a fan of the sheer a out of RNG tbh

Also what’s the Objective?

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
The Prince shouldn’t be able to get an execution “backfired”, especially since the Prince is a unique role, and that the Gambler is neutral.
What does jinx affect? Day abilities? Night abilities? Killing abilities? Clarity is important.
Roll thy Roll shouldn’t be a 2-in-1, and how does the illusion card fit with the Gambler? Same with False Death Note, why would a gambler steal a death note?

An interesting concept here, but the abilities just don’t match to what a gambler would do.

Also, what is his win condition?

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Gambler (Neutral Wildcard) (Immune to Convert)
